programme.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip
programme.desc: Russell and his mum are heading to one the USA's most haunted cities: Savannah, Georgia in the Deep South. During their stay, the Howards are set for a whole host of paranormal activities.

programme.title: Swiped
programme.desc: A womanising college student (Noah Centineo) enlists his nerdy roommate (Kendall Sanders) to code the ultimate hook up app by offering to pay his tuition for MIT but unexpected consequences ensue.

programme.title: Humor Me
programme.desc: Desolate, broke and unable to pay the rent, Nate begrudgingly moves in with his widowed father, Bob (Elliott Gould), in his New Jersey retirement golf community. Bob, always quick with a joke, uses humor to deal with all of life's challenges, even the death of his beloved wife. It drives Nate crazy. Thinking his son could benefit from some discipline, Bob sends Nate to work for Ellis (Willie Carpenter) an older ex-Marine who runs operations at the community. While at work, Nate stumbles on a senior citizen theater troupe staging a musical. Nate agrees to help but quickly realises it won't be easy to get these quirky women to cooperate.

programme.title: Awkward Sexy People
programme.desc: Jeff and Anne, two close friends and co-workers in a suburban high school, are embarrassingly unlucky at love. With nothing else to lose, they hatch a plan to transform themselves over the course of a sex-and-alcohol-fueled summer into the cool, confident people they aspire to be. At first an exhilarating adventure of self-discovery, Jeff and Anne's journey turns into a laugh-out-loud experiment as they lose their identities, their dignity, and quite possibly each other.

programme.title: Comedians Guide to Survival
programme.desc: Struggling comedian James Mullinger (based on the eponymous, real-life comedian) has come to a crossroads in his life no one wants to see him perform, his wife is fed up, and his day time boss has given him an ultimatum - take a promotion and never do stand up again, or stick to the comedy and lose his job. To add salt to the wound, his boss sends him to L.A. to interview some of the greatest comedians alive for the magazine. Thro Through spending time with his former heroes, a faint glimmer of his passion for stand-up comedy begins to stir again...

programme.title: Walk of Shame
programme.desc: After losing an audition for her dream job, Meghan Miles, a Los Angeles TV news anchor, goes out for an uncharacteristic night of partying. She awakes in a stranger’s bed to a phone message announcing the job is hers, if she can make it to the news station by time of broadcast. Stranded in an unknown area without money, a phone, and a car, Meghan — clad in a provocative yellow dress — embarks on a series of misadventures. As she races to the most important job interview of her life, she finds herself among drug dealers and hookers — all while being pursued by the LAPD, an angry taxi driver, and a young kid with an attitude.

programme.title: Black September: Munich Olympics 1972
programme.desc: At dawn, on the 11th day of the XX Olympic Games in Munich, in 1972, 8 Palestinians of the terrorist group Black September climb over the fence surrounding the Olympic village. They head towards the Israeli team’s quarter. What happens thereafter is history: eleven Israeli athletes, one German policeman and five terrorists die in a bloodbath. The Munich massacre not only shocks the whole world but also launches a new era of international terrorism. This intense and gripping film provides entirely new perspectives and insights into this traumatizing event with never-before-seen footage of the victims and of the negotiations with the terrorists.

Ian Chillcott quotes Richard Walker "one hour in the right place is worth five in the wrong" and gets mobile in his pursuit of carp until he finds a likely looking spot and Jansen Teakle has a tip for choosing your terminal tackle when shore fishing.

programme.title: The Race: All Star eSports Battle

programme.title: The Race: All Star eSports Battle

We have drivers who have won in the real world at these tracks. We also have Fernando Alonso and Juan Pablo Montoya, both of whom are only one victory away from completing the real world Triple Crown. Then we have our current stars from Formula 1, World Endurance Championship, Formula E and IndyCar racing in the Pro Cup, as well as the very fastest drivers from the world of sim racing, battling for the Sim Masters Championship.

programme.title: Fishing TV Show - Severn Barbel

Dave Springall's favourite spot is Braxted Lakes where he caught his first English 40lb carp. Adam Penning gives you some tips on winter baiting and thornback ray makes an appearance for Jansen Teakle and Julian Shambrook, shore fishing in Somerset.

programme.title: Fishing TV Show - Tough Conditions
programme.desc: In the last of the series Rae Borras and Ian Chillcott's attempts at surface fishing for carp are somewhat thwarted by tough, windy conditions at Par Fisheries in Essex. Steve Townson is out on the Zambezi River with his guide George hoping to catch a monster Vundu Catfish. Duncan Charman has a bait tip for picking out the bigger carp. Dave Barham is boat fishing out of Weymouth hoping to catch Turbot and Des Taylor goes in search of carp during a session at Monument Two.

programme.title: Data Mining The Deceased

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: SEVE - Artist, Fighter, Legend
programme.desc: Seve Ballesteros was an artist, a golfing Picasso. He was a fighter against back injury, rivals on the golf course, a disintegrating swing, and finally cancer. He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: BVB 09 Stories - Who we are: Hometown love - Away from home (Episode 1)
programme.desc: Marco Reus and Michael Zorc are two of the most prominent figures of Borussia Dortmund. Though they were both born and educated in Dortmund, they were sent away to other clubs and later returned to BVB. As well as being devoted to the pitch, Reus is very engaged with his home town and Zorc has been with BVB for 42 years. How does it feel to be at home? What are the disadvantages of loving your home when you are always on the road with a packed schedule, staying in hotels and away from family? At what point do you lose the feeling of home? This episode shows two different perspectives of life as a footballer.

programme.title: BVB 09 Stories - Who we are: Mentality (Episode 2)
programme.desc: With plenty of midweek matchdays and packed schedules, the pressure can be a lot on the body and the brain, but schedules are more important now than ever before. As a result of COVID-19, the usual atmosphere created by fans in the stadium – characterised by the legendary “Yellow Wall” – has disappeared. Players are used to crowds of 81,000 fans and the energy they create can sometimes be the difference between playing a good game or smashing their opponent. However, there is a thin line between how much pressure you need to achieve your goals and when this pressure is impacting your mental health.

programme.title: BVB 09 Stories - Who we are: Uprooting (Episode 3)
programme.desc: After the initial games, the First Eleven is established where the next generation of footballers may end up playing a crucial role for BVB. While Giovanni Reyna has already had a breakthrough into the pro team, the even younger Youssoufa Moukoko works on his debut. How do these two exceptional teenagers cope with the challenges of being in the public eye from a young early? This episode takes a close look into the challenges of talent promotion and social responsibility.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: The Okinaway of Life
programme.desc: A wonderful journey in the heart of a legendary civilization that owns the world longevity record in good health. The archipelago of Okinawa, located in the Pacific Ocean at the very south of Japan sees its population with almost no diseases. What are the secrets of Okinawa’s inhabitants ? How can we live longer, happy and in good health ?

programme.title: Australia's Camel Man
programme.desc: Afghan Willie explores the outback on his camel train, the limestone formations, the Pinnacles, of Western Australia, The Spirit of Aviation in Bundaberg, with a memorial to aviator Bert Hinkler.

programme.title: Wildlife Warriors, Classic Cars
programme.desc: From the wildlife conservation projects at Dreamworld to the rejuvenated Star on the Gold Coast. Also the superb motor vehicles of the Gosford Classic Car Museum.

programme.title: Killer in the Caves
programme.desc: About 6.5 million bats have died in the last six years in North America. A disease is driving the Little Brown Bats to extinction and causes mass mortalities among other bat species. The epidemic is still a riddle, but bat-experts piece together information like criminal investigators. The ingenuity of the scientists is captured through astonishing experiments and groundbreaking technology in an effort to understand this mysterious disease and learn more about this common yet unknown animal.

programme.title: A Model Adventure Season 1 Episode 2 - Canyoning
programme.desc: Catwalk model Kate Peck attempts to cure herself of her fear of heights by learning to abseil for a canyoning expedition that sees her attempt to take on Kanangra – Australia’s toughest canyon that only the most experienced would ever dare brave.

programme.title: Nicholas And Alexandra The Letters Episode 1
programme.desc: Desde sus brutales asesinatos hace cien años, el mundo ha estado fascinado por el zar Nicolás II y su esposa, la emperatriz Alexandra. A través de las cartas políticamente condenatorias, sexualmente íntimas y personalmente reveladoras de la pareja, este docu-drama de dos partes, presentado por la Dra. Suzannah Lipscomb, explora la compleja historia de amor de Nicholas y Alexandra y el papel de la pareja en el período previo a la Revolución Rusa que llevó a su ejecuciones trágicas.

programme.title: Alien Trespass
programme.desc: After crash landing on the outskirts of a desert town, an alien enlists the help of a local waitress to recapture a monster that has escaped the wreckage of his spaceship in this affectionate, knowing, hilarious send-up of a genreís sillier past.

programme.title: Colossal Youth
programme.desc: Colossal Youth follows four friends Ryder (Troy Osterberg), Greg (Riker Lynch), Erica (Kimmy Caruso) and Jordan (Reese Everett Ryan) as they navigate life, love and the wild and crazy times of high school. Ryder is a hopeless romantic and when his dream girl obsession Siobhan (Alexa Dowd) returns to school he goes for broke trying to win her heart. His pursuits lead him to rock bottom, but it's there that he realizes his real love has been beside him all along.

programme.title: The Agent:The Agent
programme.desc: An actor looking for an agent knocks on the wrong door and finds more than she bargained for - So does the man behind the door.

programme.title: Citizen Duane
programme.desc: CITIZEN DUANE is a comedy/drama about Duane Balfour a teen-aged Don Quixote born into a family of spectacular failure. What starts as a simple schoolyard rivalry snowballs out of control when Duane decides to run for mayor of the tiny town of Ridgeway. If Duane is to succeed, he must not only overcome the powerful incumbents, but also his own inadequacies, public perception, and history itself.

programme.title: Soundtrack to Sixteen
programme.desc: Soundtrack to Sixteen is a coming-of-age film about two anxious teens growing up in London in the 2000s. Maisy is self-conscious and constantly overanalysing. She is obsessed with having her first kiss this year, before she turns seventeen, but stalking the boy next door doesn't seem to be working. Meanwhile Ben, a boy from a nearby school, is happy being a nerd and thinking he's better than everyone else until his grades start plummeting. For the first time he must come face to face with the idea that he might, in fact, be average. When the two meet each other on the night bus things get even more confusing for them as they attempt to navigate their first potential romance under the stress of exams that will define their future.

Meanwhile Ben, a boy from a nearby school, is happy being a nerd and thinking he's better than everyone else until his grades start plummeting. For the first time he must come face to face with the idea that he might, in fact, be average. When the two meet each other on the night bus things get even more confusing for them as they attempt to navigate their first potential romance under the stress of exams that will define their future.

programme.title: Colossal Youth
programme.desc: Colossal Youth follows four friends Ryder (Troy Osterberg), Greg (Riker Lynch), Erica (Kimmy Caruso) and Jordan (Reese Everett Ryan) as they navigate life, love and the wild and crazy times of high school. Ryder is a hopeless romantic and when his dream girl obsession Siobhan (Alexa Dowd) returns to school he goes for broke trying to win her heart. His pursuits lead him to rock bottom, but it's there that he realizes his real love has been beside him all along.

programme.title: Alien Trespass
programme.desc: After crash landing on the outskirts of a desert town, an alien enlists the help of a local waitress to recapture a monster that has escaped the wreckage of his spaceship in this affectionate, knowing, hilarious send-up of a genreís sillier past.

programme.title: The Agent:The Agent
programme.desc: An actor looking for an agent knocks on the wrong door and finds more than she bargained for - So does the man behind the door.

programme.title: Citizen Duane
programme.desc: CITIZEN DUANE is a comedy/drama about Duane Balfour a teen-aged Don Quixote born into a family of spectacular failure. What starts as a simple schoolyard rivalry snowballs out of control when Duane decides to run for mayor of the tiny town of Ridgeway. If Duane is to succeed, he must not only overcome the powerful incumbents, but also his own inadequacies, public perception, and history itself.

programme.title: The Bay- The Beginning
programme.desc: Episode 4- Much to Sara's surprise, event planner Sofia Madison, the wife of Mayor Jack Madison, arrives at the Garrett estate for Brian and Zoey's wedding. Zoey's father Harold also shows up in town for the wedding and sets a surprised and uninformed Zoey off. An adulterous Marly and her lover Manny Ramos are interrupted when Manny's sister Janice unexpectedly turns up needing his help and revealing some shocking news. Lee confronts Commissioner Lex Martin about Sara and Lex's affair. Later, Pete returns to Bay City and confronts Sara. Lee discovers his stepson Brian is keeping secrets as Zoey has a change of heart.

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: Jade Bird sits down to chat about her new album and moving to the US from England. We spotlight our hand-picked favorite new artists playing Austin City Limits and more!

programme.title: Street Magic
programme.desc: The One With The Lottery Ticket - Our incredible street magicians take the art of card magic to a whole new level of incredible! Simon Pierro drives Scorpion star Ari Stidham to his wits' end while on the other side of town Kyle Marlett adds a little extra sweetness to Housewives of Orange County star Gretchen Rossi. Plus, Trigg Watson shows us some quick fashion tips, Kevin Viner picks the winning lottery numbers, Tom Burgoon's disappearing ink and Michael Grandinetti gets singed!

programme.title: Mysteries, Magic and Miracles
programme.desc: Special: ROSWELL REPORT- Investigation of facts, fiction, and possible cover-up of infamous UFO crash site in New Mexico.

programme.title: Buried Cain
programme.desc: Five childhood friends try to keep their love lives and their past, from destroying their friendship as adults. Lies and secrets hold them together until Georgia returns home. Now, they must ask themselves-how far they will go for love?

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: B-Sides covers Austin City Limits 2021 featuring interviews with performers Zella Day, AG Club, and Surfaces.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Malta- Laura visits a re-enactment of La Guardia, which represents a military performance that used to take place in the time of the Knights of St. John. Plus, the walled city of Mdina then Valletta Gozo, The Blue Grotto, St. Paul's Catacombs, and the Temple of Hagar Qim. Finally, Laura rounds out her trip with an excursion to Ggantia, the oldest free-standing structure in the world.

programme.title: The Bay- The Beginning
programme.desc: Episode 5- Lianna comes on to Pete as Marly and her husband Tony Foster arrive at the Garrett estate just in time. Brian and Zoey prepare for their wedding as Brian's stalker Igor Chambers has learned about the big day and has a special gift for the bride-to-be. Lee gets a mysterious phone call, causing him to leave the wedding abruptly. Pete begins to get some of his memories back as Lianna creates a scene. An unhappy Will and his father Dr. Campbell arrive at the wedding. Steve Jensen makes his next move.

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: B-Sides covers Austin City Limits 2021 featuring interviews with performers Zella Day, AG Club, and Surfaces.

programme.title: Street Magic
programme.desc: Food Fun, Fifty Shades of Rope, and Crazy, Crazy Cards- Simon Pierro works more of his techno magic on Scorpion star Ari Stidham. Plus, Matthew Teague has fun with fruit at LA's Farmer's Market, Nathaan Phan materializes cards in the oddest of places, magic's craziest magician Ed Alonzo channels a celebrity ghost to amaze a few baffled tourists on Hollywood Boulevard, Joel Ward does 50 shades of rope magic, Suzanne shows two women how disappearing ink really works, Chris Oberle's stupefying bar code mentalism, and Murray SawChuck wants to make sure you're getting the most out of your veggies!

programme.title: Mysteries, Magic and Miracles
programme.desc: "Origin of the Universe": theories about how the whole thing started! "Chicago Ghosts": weird hauntings in the Windy City. "Past Life Regression": do we live more than one life? Actual on-camera regression session.

programme.title: Real Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Segments include "Red Feather", "Legend of Moody's Light", "Spirit Investigators", "From the Other Side", "Shadows of Chicago", "Spirits Among Us" and "Star Struck Spirits".

programme.title: Jack Pierce: The Maker Of Monsters
programme.desc: In today's cinematic world of digital effects, telling what is real from what was created in a computer is impossible. But there was a time when Hollywood relied on nothing more than an artist's ability to create a boogie man with grease paint, cotton, glue, hair, and a few simple materials to draw people into the theatre to be chilled and thrilled.

programme.title: Aliens: Are We Alone?
programme.desc: Does alien life exist out there in the Universe? Scientists are now getting closer than ever to answering that question thanks to the Kepler Space Telescope. This revolutionary spacecraft is on a mission to find habitable alien planets. Thanks to Kepler, we now know of thousands of possible planets and we’re getting closer than ever to finding the holy grail: a twin of our Earth. We use CGI to bring these alien worlds to life, and with the help of scientists, we speculate on what extra-terrestrial life might be like.

programme.title: Hitler's Mein Kampf: A Dangerous Book
programme.desc: In 2016, 70 years after the death of his author, Mein Kampf entered into the public domain. Several questions arise with it: why does the book remain so dangerous? Why do Hitler’s thoughts remain so fascinating?

programme.title: The Bay Games
programme.desc: Over 600 everyday athletes came together and competed in the country’s first ever functional fitness festival. Jervis Bay, NSW is home to The Bay Games, a two-day event that pushes these weekend warriors to their limits and beyond. Our cameras were there.

programme.title: Numbers
programme.desc: Zero is a number that was inconceivable to humankind and peculiar in many regards compared to the other numbers. Today, the existence of zero is common knowledge and most people find it hard to understand why it could be different or special. Zero is a key number in the Arabic numeral system that is prevalent all over the world today.

programme.title: Japan's Lost Atlantis
programme.desc: Monty Halls braves the rip currents off a remote Japanese island to investigate claims of a lost civilisation sunk beneath the waves. Are the underwater terraces, archways and giant head evidence of a Japanese Atlantis or just an extraordinary natural rock formation?

programme.title: Mafia and Italy, a Bloody Pact
programme.desc: In 1992, the anti-Mafia magistrates Falcone and Borsellino were murdered in Palermo, the capital of Sicily. For a long time public opinion believed in a story of revenge that of Toto Riina who was head of Cosa Nostra, the fearsome Sicilian mafia. Now a lawsuit is challenging this hypothesis. Within the Italian state, someone is said to have guided the murders. With exclusive testimonies from judges, politicians and witnesses under protection, this film reveals several decades of incestuous links between the State and the mafia.

programme.title: The Dinosaur Echo
programme.desc: The Dinosaur Echo is a documentary about the renaissance of paleontology in Canada today and what dinosaurs can teach us about climate change. The film introduces us to a new generation of paleontolgists who are making extraordinary dinosaur discoveries in Alberta and British Columbia in Canada. The Dinosaur Echo is directed, written and produced by Canadian filmmaker Brandy Yanchyk.

programme.title: It Takes a Thief
programme.desc: Burglarized twice in the house which they've lived in since 1973, Suzanne and her 30-something twin daughters feel vulnerable in the precious home, particularly with the absence of any male figure. Bring in the ex-burglars for their first step to safety!

programme.title: Savage Wild

programme.title: Savage Wild

programme.title: Savage Wild
programme.desc: Manny explores the Santa Fe River in search of alligators, snapping turtles and other wildlife.

programme.title: Savage Wild
programme.desc: Exploring a flooded abandoned mine at night, Manny Puig searches for predators.

programme.title: On the Brink
programme.desc: Malaika Vaz spends a few days with snake rescuer Ajay Giri in Agumbe to better understand the king cobra and its secret world.

programme.title: Austin Stevens
programme.desc: Austin is back in his element when he goes out to find the largest snake in Africa. To say this creature is dangerous is an understatement, as it has been known to prey on crocodiles.

programme.title: Austin Stevens
programme.desc: Austin Stevens travels to Swaziland in search of the rare black rhino. After a number of close and dangerous encounters, Austin finally finds what he is looking for.

programme.title: Austin Stevens
programme.desc: Austin travels to Mexico to catch a glimpse of the Tzabcan rattlesnake, which was once hailed as a god by the ancient Mayans. With the help of local guides and a shaman, he braves underground rivers and dense rainforest in search of the snake.

programme.title: Austin Stevens
programme.desc: The Burmese python is not a native species to the swamplands of Florida. Austin is on the search to relocate one of these reptilian giants to a new home.

programme.title: Deadly Australia
programme.desc: Kelly visits David Flaey National Park to get up close to Wally the Platypus, whose poisonous spur could teach us about pain relief.

programme.title: Ocean Vet

programme.desc: Yearning for more is the focus of these short films, whether that be fame, creative success, love, happiness, or a sense of belonging. This is an assorted range of stories tapping into our universal desire to achieve our dreams.

programme.title: Critically Acclaimed
programme.desc: This group showcases independent, award-winning stories of high quality with many having been selected at film festivals and contests. This collection includes family drama, emotional stories, romance, comedy, and more.

programme.title: Period/Historical
programme.desc: A collection of short films set in different times throughout history, from the battlefields of WW2 to the streets of 1950s Mississippi, these are dramas and action stories that focus on the power of individual choice and the strength of humanity.

programme.title: German Corner
programme.desc: A range of stand-out short films in the German language showcasing original stories, deeply layered characters, and high-quality production values. Some highly relevant themes are explored in this selection.

programme.title: Sci Fi
programme.desc: A range of stories along the spectrum of science fiction urging us to look at the consequences of AI among other futuristic and sometimes dystopian themes

programme.title: Intimate Drama
programme.desc: A focus on character-driven stories that leave an emotional impact through quietly powerful storytelling, often with a deeper social or psychological message beneath the surface.

programme.title: Crime
programme.desc: A varied selection of films whose stories all have crime at their core in some form or another, whether subtextual or directly related to the plot, this is an impressive range of stories from around the world.

programme.title: Period/Historical
programme.desc: A collection of short films set in different times throughout history, from the battlefields of WW2 to the streets of 1950s Mississippi, these are dramas and action stories that focus on the power of individual choice and the strength of humanity.

programme.title: Looking for Grace
programme.desc: After a teenage girl named Grace goes missing, her parents along with the help of an investigator seek to find her, while also juggling their own secrets and stories between them.

programme.title: Inescapable
programme.desc: One afternoon, on a typical day at work, Adib is confronted with devastating news: His eldest daughter, Muna, has gone missing in Damascus. Now Adib, who has not been back in over 20 years, must return to Syria and deal with his secret past in order to find her. Inescapable is a thriller about a father's desperate search for his daughter and the chaos of the Middle East he left behind.

programme.title: Braven
programme.desc: Joe Braven is a logging company owner who lives with his family in Canada. Joe's father, Linden, suffering from dementia, mistakes a woman in a bar for his wife, prompting a barroom brawl that lands Linden in the hospital. The family decides to take a break at their secluded log cabin, where they run into trouble from a drug dealer who wants to use Joe's business as a front for his cocaine operation.

programme.title: The Assassin's Code
programme.desc: Rookie Cleveland detective Michael Connelly is desperate to escape from under the shadow of his late father, a detective convicted of a drug scandal within the department when Michael was a boy. When a million dollars' worth of drugs are stolen from police custody and the detective on the case soon turns up dead, Michael begs his captain for the assignment and the chance to prove himself. But when his investigation points toward a crime network, Michael faces pressure to maintain the status quo as he plays a cat-and-mouse game with the powers that be, while under the watchful eye of a ghost-like assassin ensuring their secrecy.

programme.title: Flame & Citron
programme.desc: During Nazi occupation, red-headed Bent Faurschou-Hviid ("Flame") and Jørgen Haagen Schmith ("Citron"), assassins in the Danish resistance, take orders from Winther, who's in direct contact with Allied leaders. One shoots, the other drives. Until 1944, they kill only Danes then Winther gives orders to kill Germans. When a target tells Bent that Winther's using them to settle private scores, doubt sets in, complicated by Bent's relationship with the mysterious Kitty Selmer, who may be a double agent. Also, someone in their circle is a traitor. Can Bent and Jørgen kill an über-target, evade capture, and survive the war? And is this heroism, naiveté, or mere hatred?

She wishes her problems with her ex could go away, and upon venting her frustrations one night, finds herself tangled up in a pact with two people (Melanie and Kevin) to “eliminate” each other’s problems.

programme.title: Same Time Next Week

Desperate to get his life back on track, he wants to win back his elusive ex-girlfriend Kelly (Annabelle Wallis), but learns that the road to happiness can be unpredictable, unconventional and unbelievably funny

programme.title: Deadly Encounter
programme.desc: Experience extreme road rage in this exhilarating, edge-of-your-seat thriller. A hard-working mother (Laura Leighton: Pretty Little Liars) angers another driver when she cuts him off on her way home. The driver takes it personally and before long, the enraged man is dishing out a sinister type of road rage as he begins to terrorise her. A tense and nail-biting revenge thriller.

programme.title: Man Down
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf (Fury), Gary Oldman (The Dark Knight), Jai Courtney (Suicide Squad) and Kate Mara (House of Cards) headline this gripping, post-apocalyptic thriller. Home bound from Afghanistan, Gabriel, a hard-nosed US marine whose instinct is to shoot first and ask questions later, desperately searches for his estranged family. This pulse-pounding story delivers a hard-hitting message.

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Ozzy, a friendly beagle, has his idyllic life turned upside down when his family decide to leave for a holiday where no dogs are allowed! Unable to bring their beloved Ozzy along for the ride, they settle on the next best thing: a top-of-the-line canine spa called Blue Creek. This picture-perfect place turns out to be a facade, constructed by its villainous owner to capture dogs. Ozzy will soon end up in the real Blue Creek: a prison for dogs, run by dogs. To avoid danger and make it home to his family with his life intact, Ozzy teams up with his new friends, Chester, Fronky and Doc, to escape the prison and return home to safety.

programme.title: Molang - Season 1 - Episodes 15-21
programme.desc: The Parcel The Butterfly The Surprise The Forest The Pumpkin The Armchair Stage Fright Molang is an affectionate, humorous look at the relationship between an eccentric, joyful, and enthusiastic rabbit, and a shy, discreet, and emotional little chick. programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: Black or White is the story of a grandfather who is suddenly left to care for his beloved granddaughter. When her paternal grandmother seeks custody with the help of her brother, the little girl is torn between two families who love her deeply. With the best intentions at heart, both families fight for what they feel is right and are soon forced to confront their true feelings about race, forgiveness and understanding. Anchored by an all-star cast and inspired by true events, Black or White is a look at two seemingly different worlds, in which nothing is as simple as black or white.

programme.title: Voice from the Stone
programme.desc: A haunting horror thriller set in an isolated castle in 1950s Tuscany, Voice From the Stone tells the story of Verena (Emilia Clarke: TV’s Game of Thrones, Me Before You), a determined young nurse who is hired to aid a boy through the trauma of his mother's sudden death. As she works with the troubled boy, she falls under the spell of a malevolent force inside the castle.

programme.title: Big Sky
programme.desc: Hazel (Bella Thorne) suffers from a crippling case of agoraphobia. So much so that it causes a rift between her and her mother, Dee (Kyra Sedgwick). Hazel and her mother decide to go on a road trip to a desert facility to help Hazel deal with her fear, but when gunmen and brothers Jesse (Frank Grillo) and Pru (Aaron Tveit) attack them, Hazel has to battle her fears so she and her mother can survive.

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: Estranged sisters, Ines (Vikander) and Emilie (Green) take a trip across Europe to reconnect. Little does Ines know that Emilie is suffering from terminal cancer and plans to spend her final days in a centre run by Marina. A lavish set of grounds, the centre is a final resting stop for many others facing a similar fate, including the eccentric Mr Daren and the wheel chair bound Brian. Here the sisters finally reconnect and discover the beauty and fragility of family, love and friendship.

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: Eric Lombard is at a crossroads - does he continue to pursue his long-shot dream of playing professional football, or does he start the next phase of his life, and apply to law school? As he struggles with this decision, Eric - along with his longtime girlfriend, Colleen - visits his cousin in Florence. There, to his surprise, he gets involved with the ancient local sport of Calcio Storico - and everything that Eric has assumed about his life is challenged.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Emperor unearths a 2000-year-old nightmare - a secret that should have remained buried. A team of scientists, who lose a colleague in an ancient labyrinth, must work together to recover him while trying to make the discovery of a century. In their quest to rescue him, they find themselves underground, battling ancient, terrifying Chinese magic and making their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating spiders – only to uncover the secret behind the insects’ power and intelligence.

programme.title: Witchville
programme.desc: In the Middle Ages, Erik and Jason seek out his compatriot Malachy and force him to return to his homeland. When they arrive, they find that Malachy's father, the King, is dead and their lands are completely devastated. Both seek revenge against the Evil Red Queen.

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: Set in the very near future, an elite squad of highly trained marines, led by commanding officer Captain Bukes, are sent on a routine training exercise to a remote island, from which all communications have been cut off. Accompanying them on the mission is 'tech head' Specialist Mills, a mysterious coder whose brain is interfaced with a computer. When they reach the island, the unit soon discover they are not alone and the exercise is far from routine. They become live targets of terrifyingly advanced military robots and begin to suspect that Mills is somehow involved in the conspiracy. But without the help of Mill's technology, they know they won't survive.

programme.title: In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Tale
programme.desc: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son - both committed by the Krugs, a race of animal warriors controlled by the evil Gallian

programme.title: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon
programme.desc: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon is a “jaws”-dropping action thriller from the director of Kickboxer starring John Barrowman and Jenny McShane. When two researchers discover a colossal shark's tooth off the Mexican coast their worst fears surface - the most menacing beast to ever rule the waters is still alive and mercilessly feeding on anything that crosses its path.
